summary.item: Received the PayPalian award for my involvement in the Airlines Project.

Developed for and support for very large, multiplatform, multithreaded, 24x365, 99% availability, and mission critical, extremely scalable enterprise-class application. For name brand companies in the U.S. such as MCI, Candle (now par of IBM) and EDS. Some of these applications supported over 500 different groups and performed more than 4 million transactions daily.

Architected solutions for large scale, complex and large budget applications. In the telecom, Data entry and IT industry. In collaboration with management, clients and peers. Lead design meetings, applied latest analysis and documentation tools and techniques.

Project management or pioneering groups. Interaction with end users and upper management, reporting up to VP level. Managed multiple large scale projects. Involved in all areas of project planning and management.
On call, second level support with participation of multiple groups spread across the company and the country, in fast pace high pressure circumstances.

Inventor of 6 patent applications and co-inventor of 1 patent application for a joint venture between MCI and Microsoft. The patent application numbers are: 20050034079, 20030191868, 20030191750, 20030191749, 20030191748, 20030191747 one patent has been granted: 7,243,355
Discrete use and protection of proprietary technology for top 500 US companies.
Reverse-engineered several old systems, to document and enhance with new functions, in Unix, MVS, C, C++ and proprietary languages.
Continual education, internal training classes from recognized companies such as IBM. Multiple certifications and partial master’s degree.

position.projects: FinSys/FinProd, BML, Airlines, FDMS Direct, RBS, Amex MC, and others.

skill.name: C++
skill.note: MSVC++, gcc, xlC, DLLs, MSFC, Device drivers, Unix, MVS, DOS, Linux, Windows, IPC, TCP/IP, multithreaded applications.

skill.name: C
skill.note: MSVC++, gcc, xlC, DLLs, Device drivers, STL, Unix, MVS, DOS, Linux, Windows, Rogue wave, Insure++, IPC, TCP/IP, multithreaded applications.

skill.name: Java
skill.note: JavaBens, Servelets, Package and program development.

skill.name: MQ Series - Now websphere
skill.note: Creation and management of MQ objects, messages creation and management, MQ API.

skill.name: Unix (AIX,HP,Solaris,Linux)
skill.note: Software development, software installation and configuration.

skill.name: Project Managment
skill.note: Project planning, project tracking, staffing, day to day supervision, requirements gathering, architecture design.

skill.name: LDAP
skill.note: Queries and updates employing the API. Open LDAP.

skill.name: Debugging (gdb, insure++, etc.)
skill.note: Performance testing, code coverage, memory leak detection.

skill.name: MVS
skill.note: IBM Mainframe, ISPF, Software development, C, Assembler,TSO, JCL, CLISTS, REXX.

skill.name: HTML,PHP
skill.note: Developed web pages for the configuration, management and configuration of internal applications.

skill.name: Assembler
skill.note: MVS, DOS, MC6400 cross compiling, language extension, device drivers.
